savedArticles.title: "Bad Days...": KKR Star Shares Cryptic Post As BCCI Announce Squad For WI T20Is - NDTV Sports
savedArticles.description: A number of IPL performers were snubbed by the BCCI as the Indian squad for the West Indies T20Is was announced.
savedArticles.content: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) announced the India squad for the T20I series against West Indies on Wednesday, breaking quite a few fans' hearts. The likes of Rinku Singh, Ruturaj Gâ€¦ [+1940 chars]
